thread.title: Quiz: Which weird driving laws do you know?
thread.title_full: Quiz: Which weird driving laws do you know? - Telegraph

author: Soo Kim
title: Quiz: Which weird driving laws do you know?
text: New research by the travel booking website Kayak.co.uk has revealed a 64 per cent increase in searches for hire cars to European destinations, compared to last year. Norway was revealed as the UK's favourite place for a road trip, with the number of Britons looking to hire a car in the Scandinavian nation increasing by 158 per cent. With so many Britons expected to be on foreign's road this summer, Kayak.co.uk has compiled a list of the worldâ€™s strangest traffic laws. How good is your knowledge? Take the quiz to find out Follow @telegraphtravel
